Comment: This whole thing is a fucking sham.  Gold dropped but our currency hasn’t recovered.   Gold was hitting record highs and retail was going heavy in Gold.  Now stocks are up and Gold is down, but with the currency issues the rises are little more than stacking Monopoly money.   There’s really no winning. Our currency dropped  when Trump was trying to be a bully and now it’s dropping because he simply looks weak.
